resume: The film centers about the impossible love between Gamero, the King of the Guajiros  and Chiquinquirá , who decide to live their passional adventure, which is forbidden because he is a wayuu and she is an alijuna . In order to protect the life of Chiquinquirá, Gamero hires Alatriste , a basque detective WAYUU: La niña de Maracaibo, revela los secretos. Agencia Carabobeña de Noticias . with a past that torments him.
